channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Rookie’s Secret Weapon for Creating Cash Flow in ANY Real Estate Market
item.description: Anyone can get into real estate investing. Seriously, anyone! With today’s high interest rates, it may be more difficult to find a rental property that cash flows, but even if […]

item.title: Kiteworks captures $456M at a $1B+ valuation to help secure sensitive data
item.description: Mark up another unicorn and large funding round for the cybersecurity industry: Kiteworks, a company that builds tools to secure email communications, file sharing, and other situations where people are working with sensitive or proprietary data outside their firewalls, has raised $456 million from Insight Partners and Sixth Street Growth. The investment values the company […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How the 1968 DNC in Chicago Devolved into ‘Unrestrained and Indiscriminate Police Violence’
item.description: As protesters prepare for the Democratic National Convention in Chicago next week, a half-century old report provides lessons for preventing chaos.

item.title: Early Symptoms and Signs of Psoriatic Arthritis
item.description: Psoriatic arthritis can occur in up to one-third of individuals with psoriasis. Discover the early signs of this chronic inflammatory arthritis.

item.title: How to Retire Early with Fewer Rental Properties Than You Think
item.description: You want to retire early, so you come up with a plan. “I’m going to buy ten rental properties and call it quits, then I’ll never have to work again.” […]

item.title: Apple finally allows Spotify to show pricing info to EU users on iOS
item.description: Spotify will be able to display the pricing for things like Spotify subscriptions and digital goods, including Spotify's more recently added collection of audiobooks. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Aaron Sankin is The Marshall Project’s new Deputy Data Editor
item.description: Sankin brings deep experience with ambitious data projects.

item.title: Rate Cuts Could See Commercial Real Estate Rebound. Take a Deeper Look At These Investments.
item.description: Investors have their checkbooks ready, poised to go on a buying frenzy if interest rates continue to drop. Commercial real estate, in particular, has been decimated in recent years. The […]

item.title: The defense tech acquisition spree has begun: Autonomous factory startup Hadrian acquires Datum Source
item.description: Hadrian announced they bought Datum Source, a software company founded by SpaceX alums that uses AI to help hardware companies find manufacturing partners. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ‘Deliberate Indifference’: Court Rulings Challenge Extreme Heat Conditions in Prisons
item.description: “If it’s 103 outside, it may be 107 to -8 inside of your cell,” said a man who worked in the fields while imprisoned in Texas.

item.title: The Link Between AFib and Thyroid Disease
Should I Pay Off My Mortgage or Invest? (We Did the Math)
item.description: Pay off your mortgage or invest? If you’re on the path to FIRE, you’ve probably asked yourself this question. Without a mortgage payment, you could put thousands more in your […]

item.title: India’s top court clears way for Byju’s insolvency proceedings
item.description: India's Supreme Court has cleared the way for insolvency proceedings to be resumed against Byju's in a win for U.S. creditors. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Tim Walz on Criminal Justice: 5 Things to Know
item.description: Where Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris’ running mate, stands on policing, guns, prison reform and other issues.

item.title: Demand For Section 8 Housing Will Remain High—Here’s Why
item.description: Many Americans struggle to afford housing and will continue to, making this one of the most surefire ways to keep your properties in demand.

item.title: xAI releases Grok-2, adds image generation on X
item.description: Elon Musk-owned launched Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini in beta today with improved reasoning. The new Grok AI model can now generate images on the X social network, though Grok access is currently limited to Premium and Premium+ users on X. xAI said that both Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini are available to users on X in […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: They Exposed Police Misconduct. Now They’re Paying a Steep Price.
item.description: Whistleblower laws have advanced in public and private sectors, but protections for police who report illegal or unethical behavior lag far behind.
